pages.text: A truly exceptional weapon, it embodies the definition of "offense is a good defense."\It is the nature of the Dreamflayer to balance forces:\The more armored your opponent is compared to you, the more damage it will do.

_If you ever needed a reason to go rampage lightly clad, here it is._\\$(k:sneak) + $(k:use) to empower it, allowing it to slice even through the strongest of armour while consuming $(c_red)Red Ink[#]() at an alarming rate.
